label: depositValueValidityPeriod
comment: The specified period during which the deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions is valid.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date.

domainIncludes.comment: The procedures to follow for returnable assets, such as reusable packaging (pallets, crates).
